candidates.name: Font Family:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: var(--font-sans) = -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu...

candidates.name: Use Component Classes:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Apply the appropriate component classes (btn, card, alert, etc.) rather than custom styling

candidates.name: Mobile First:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Design for mobile screens first, then enhance for larger viewports

candidates.name: Accessibility First:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Ensure all components have proper semantic HTML, ARIA labels, and focus states

candidates.name: Consistent Spacing:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Use spacing tokens consistently throughout your layouts

candidates.name: Color Contrast:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Maintain WCAG AA (4.5:1) or AAA (7:1) contrast ratios for text

candidates.name: Touch Targets:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Keep interactive elements at least 44px high for touch accessibility

candidates.name: Dark Mode:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: All components support dark mode through CSS custom properties

candidates.name: Responsive Design:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: Use media queries and fluid sizing for responsive components
